tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Sarveshwari Singh gave me my smile back. She is super friendly and professional. Would recommend dental roots to family and friends. 
Would also like to mention Dr Aditi, I’ve had treatment done by her before, and would also recommend her to my family and friends. Thank you. Keep shining.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr. Aditi provided an excellent teeth scaling experience during my first visit to a dental clinic. The professionalism and care demonstrated throughout the appointment were impressive. I felt comfortable and reassured by her expertise and attention to detail. I will definitely recommend her services to others seeking dental care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I went to Dr. Dheeraj Setia after meeting 2 others. Immediately decided to go with him because of the following :
1. Extremely friendly and unassuming.
2. Explained the details about my condition...answered all my questions and addressed all my concerns.
3. Excellent Clinic...well laid out, spacious and very well designed.
4. Helpful and friendly staff.
While it took several sittings to complete the procedures, I am quite happy with the end result. And the extra sittings did not cost a paisa beyond what Dr. Dheeraj had originally given me an estimate of.
Would highly reccomend Dr. Dheeraj of Dental Roots any time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Knowledgeable and helpful doctor Sarveshwari Singh. Highly recommend it. Very friendly doctor and helped throughout.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I would rather qualify my experience as “at par”.I visited Dental Roots clinic  after getting severe pain and infection in right premolar resulted by sharp food item pierced through in hollow RC.Waited around 15 more minutes than scheduled time which is quite OK and reasonable wait time.Doctor Setia shared his assessment after checkup and suggested for root extraction and further implant as a permanent solution. Doctor gave ample time to listen all questions and answered them patiently.A lady doctor shared diagnosis of x-ray and also talked about different implants options available along with their pros and cons. She answered all the queries in length.I requested lady Doc for pain reliever medicine for my severe pain and also conveyed my wish to take second opinion before going for extraction   implant procedure. ****** ***** **** ***** **************Lady doctor shared photo copy of consultation on plain paper, with no clinic reference whatsoever. I guess they want to keep prices of implant unofficial but not sharing diagnosis and consultation detail on plain white with no clinic reference is quite unusual – perhaps first in my recent memory.Despite asking twice for pain relieving medicines, **** ****** ****** ********* *** ********* ** *** *** ******* ** ***** ** ***** ******* ********I called clinic from pharmacy after realizing that “plain consultation paper” has only details of implants and its costs but no medicines, I was then asked to wait for few minutes so they can send medicine names on WhatsApp.After waiting for another 15 minutes, I again called clinic and then someone from clinic sent me medicine names. I got the impression that Doctors were more interested in implant procedure than helping me in severe root pain which was my first reason to visit Dr. Setia clinic.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: ******* ***** **** *** **** *** ********* i went to him for tooth extraction and bridging work. After the first consultation he started insisting on implants and when i totally refused, his attitude changed, he reluctantly agreed for bridge. On the day of extraction, i filled a form where i stated that i was allergic to penicillin. I also specifically told the doctor that i wanted only extraction that day and the rest to be completed on another day, after extraction which was pretty painful he convinced me to sit for there next hour for tooth cutting for bridges.i was exhausted and went home in a bad condition and took the antibiotics prescribed by them. Next day I had an allergic reaction. My lips had swollen triple their size, i immediately called him to check if i should stop the antibiotic and sent him a photo. A junior doctor from his office called and said that it was not an allergic reaction and i should continue the medication. 3rd day he called me for the fitting of a temporary bridge where i showed him that my  upper palette had severe ulceration and pain due to allergy, he still disregarded and told me to continue taking medication and fitted my teeth with an ill fitting temp crown. 4th day my allergy was so severe, i rushed to a nearby doctor where  he confirmed that i was suffering a severe allergic reaction, told me to stop medication immediately and change my dentist. i had to make an emergency appointment with dheeraj setia as i was unable to eat and the crown was adding to the discomfort of the allergy, the consulting doctors at his own clinic confirmed my allergy but dheeraj came and said that this was a nervous reaction, and ive been to other dentists many times before never has anyone said this or have i had any allergic reaction. i could not eat anything for the next 10 days and the day my sutures were to be removed, he told me that he wanted to take the impression again, give more anesthesia for more cutting and i refused as i wanted to be sure of what caused my allergy. i told him that i would get the rest of the work done in my country after getting an allergy test, which is totally reasonable as I am concerned about my health. he saw that now the entire amount would have to be refunded which is 72000 minus extraction and cutting work, he started speaking rudely to my mother and me and didnt tell us how much he will return. after 10 days we got a msg from his clinic saying that they will charge 50000 for extraction and cutting work. we thought this was unreasonable. so my husband spoke to dheeraj setia and as a recorded call i have proof of him saying he will return 67000. after 10 days only 47000 was refunded with no explanation. ****** ****** ** **** **********

tags: None
review: This was my first visit , I have been to dentists all my life since I was a child and yes I can certainly say I was extremely happy with the services . Doctor Dheeraj is extremely polite , positive  and makes the patient feel comfortable . I highly recommend him .

review: ********* ****** very neat painless procedure, polite staff.  I was on a short India visit with a plethora of issues. The doctor paid me excellent attention and scheduled the various treatments to complete all works very well and very timely. Impressive

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
When I visit a doctor I like the overall picture for e.g friendliness, cleanliness. How the staff is, weather the doctor explains the treatment procedure. 
Dr. Setia and his clinic fulfills this. 
The patient is greeted and welcomed, the clinic is very clean. This shows that he cares for the patients. 
Best of all, I am a visual person and the Dr showed me the pictures on the screen which was helpful for me to know what I would be going through.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have seen many Dentists but Dr Dheeraj is best.
It's been 12 years Dr Dheeraj is our family Dentist.
Dr Dheeraj and his staff along with other doctors at his hospital are very friendly and expert in their areas of interest.*** *** **** **** ****** ********* **** ** ** ** ********

review: Dr Dheeraj is superb. I went to two doctors in mumbai and finally had to fly down to delhi to get my tooth fixed. He identifies the issue and gives the correct solution. As compared to my treatment in mumbai I faced less pain had my root canal and filling and crown placed - I would blindly recommend him

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: He is a dr who listens to the patient and give advice accordingly. Very patient and very careful in his treatment as I was going thru a root canal. Never felt discomfort as I am a very anxious person. But he made me very comfortable.  Very well recommended dr  very clean place and very professional

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very very bad experience. Doctor hardly examined for 5 mins and began to write prescription. We kept explaining the issue and probing him further but it seems he had already decided the issue and began prescribing accordingly. My wife didn't take the medicines prescribed *** **** *** **** **** **** we went to another dentist next day. My wife had clearly mentioned the chemicals she's allergic to in her pre-consultation form, *** ****** ****** ** **** *** **** *** ********** ********* **** *** **** ********** **** **** ******* ** **** ***** **** *** ********** ********* ********* *** ******** ********* *** *********** *** **** *** **** ** ******* *** **** ** ***** ********** ** *** **** ** *** ******* He took a X-ray without asking us within 3 mins of consultation and then charged 500rs for 1 tooth X-ray. ** **** ***** **** **** **** ***** *** ***** **** ** ***** ******* ****** ******** Very bad experience indeed, avoid in all situations.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
